text: Sawdah bint Zam'ah was Muhammad's wife and was revered by Muslims as Ummat ul- Mu'mineen. She was the Second wife of the prophet who married him a month after the death of Khadija. == Other websites == * 2 Muslims.com * SAWDA bint Zam'a Category:674 deaths Category:Wives of Muhammad Category:570 births
title: Sawdah bint Zam'ah
